body: These stylish black leather boots are stitched with images of winding roads and trails through peaceful orchards. They can be worn up to mid-thigh, or have their cuffs turned down to make knee-high boots. Three times per day, on command for 1 round when the wearer makes a 5-foot step, he can move up to 15 feet. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
name: Jaunt Boots
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Feet/Feet Slot Wondrous Items/Jaunt Boots
